localResource.name: Data_Centers
localResource.label: Data_Centers
localResource.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT o.historyId as historyId, o.datacenterId as datacenterId, CASE WHEN o.deleteDate IS NULL THEN datacenterName ELSE (datacenterName || ' (Removed on ' || cast(deleteDate as string) || ')') END as datacenterNameIc, o.deleteDate as deleteDate FROM V23DatacenterConfigurationView as o WHERE o.historyId = (SELECT max(a.historyId) FROM V23DatacenterConfigurationView as a WHERE a.datacenterId = o.datacenterId) and o.datacenterId in (select distinct d.datacenterId from V23ClusterConfigurationView as d where d.clusterId in (select distinct c.clusterId from V23VmConfigurationView as c)) order by o.deleteDate DESC
